main_definition: A planned endeavor, typically involving research or development efforts designed to achieve a particular aim.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To cast (a shadow) by projecting light
meanings_and_examples.example: The sun's rays projected a long shadow on the ground as it set.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A planned endeavor, typically involving research or development efforts designed to achieve a particular aim.
meanings_and_examples.example: The engineering team is working on a new software 'project' with the goal of creating an innovative app.
She projected her expenses for the upcoming year to plan her budget accordingly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A task or assignment given, typically as part of a job or school curriculum.
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher assigned a research 'project' on endangered species to his students.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An extended period of time during which one is engaged in an activity
meanings_and_examples.example: He took the first two months off work for a personal project he was passionate about.
